TLINE.TDLINE: This report performs the necessary checks for Business Partner before
The <ZH>prechecks </>that the report executes are listed here:
<LS>BP roles are assigned to account groups</>
<LS>Every account group BP Grouping must be available</>
<LS>Customer and Vendor Value Mapping (BP-> Customer or Vendor)</>
Note that <LS>CVI Mapping</> and <LS>Contact Person Mapping</> are
mandatory checks that you need to perform.
The report also performs a <ZH>post check</>, <LS>Contact Person
Before you execute the report, ensure that you maintain the Customizing
entries listed below for the checks that you want the report to perform:
<ZH>BP roles are assigned to account groups </>
For <ZH>Customer</>, you must maintain the entries in Customizing for
<DS:SIMG.CVIV_CUST_TO_BP2>Define BP Role for Direction Customer to BP
For <ZH>Vendor</>, you must maintain the entries in Customizing for
<DS:SIMG.CVIV_VEND_TO_BP2>Define BP Role for Direction Vendor to BP</>
<ZH>For every account group BP Grouping must be available</>
For <ZH>Customer</>, you must maintain the entries in Customizing for
For <ZH>Vendor</>, you must maintain the entries in Customizing for
You must maintain the entries in Customizing for <ZH>Business Partner
You must maintain the entries in Customizing for <ZH>Business Partner
You must maintain the entries in Customizing for <ZH>Business Partner
<ZH>For Checking Direction from Customer to BP</>
You must maintain the entries in Customizing for <ZH>Business Partner
<DS:SIMG.CVIV_CUST_TO_BP2>Define BP Role for Direction Customer to BP
<ZH>For Checking Direction from Vendor to BP</>
You must maintain the entries in Customizing for <ZH>Business Partner
<DS:SIMG.CVIV_VEND_TO_BP2>Define BP Role for Direction Vendor to BP</>

Based on your requirements, select the checks that you want the report
to perform. Then, execute the report.
The report generates an ALV output containing the status of each check
If the status is green, this indicates that check is successful.
If the status is red, you must click on the status icon to get more
information on what caused the error and resolve the errors by
maintaining the Customizing entries listed in <ZH>Prerequisites</>.
